pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Got2b Farewell Flyaways Touch Up Brush 16ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

With our NEW got2b Farewell Flyaways you can tame & fix your flyaways in no time!

Thanks to the lightweight and non-greasy gel formula you can precisely hold down your wild strands and create a flawless, sleek look with a polished finish.

The precise Touch-Up Brush is perfect for a quick touch-up on the go. Small, handy, fitting in every bag, suitable for every occasion.

Keep your hair effortlessly in shape whilst out and about.

Style your hair as desired in a bun, ponytail, braid, top knot or slicked back.

Apply on dry hair.

Brush over flyaways with the touch-up brush.

There is no need to use a hairbrush after the application.

Do not use on eyelashes or eyebrows.

Done! When you're ready, simply toss your got2b Farewell Flyaways in your bag for touch-ups and re-use whenever needed.

Close tightly to avoid drying out and spilling.

General Information

It's got to be got2b! Give frizz no chance! With got2b Farewell Flyaways you can tame and fix your flyaways in no time. Be it in a bun, ponytail, braid or top knot, no adventure can bring your hair out of style! Keep your hair effortlessly in shape whilst out and about.

Style your hair as desired. For a polished finish, brush over the flyaways with the touch-up brush. Toss it in your bag and re-use whenever needed.

From volume & shine to hold & spikes, got2b offers the right styling products for your individual look. It's all about expressing your style - show off your personality, individuality & attitude with got2b brand! No matter what look you're going for, you can get it with got2b products. You got2b you!

Bottle with brush can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details. Box and leaflet can be recyclable in kerbside.

Suitable For: All hair types

Size: 16mL

Hair Type: All hair types.

KEY FEATURES

• For polished finish without frizz or flyaways
• With unique touch-up brush
• Light hold
• Lightweight & non-greasy
• You got2b you!

Warnings

Do not use on eyelashes or eyebrows. Close tightly to avoid drying out and spilling.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau), Glycerin, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Propylene Glycol, VP/VA Copolymer, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Polyquaternium-10, Parfum (Fragrance), Citric Acid, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Linalool, Sodium Chloride, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Sodium Acetate, Coumarin, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Style your hair as desired. For a polished finish, brush over the flyaways with the touch-up brush. Toss it in your bag and re-use whenever needed.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle with brush can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details.
Box and leaflet can be recyclable in kerbside.

Box and leaflet

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
